attributes.action: Provide financial support scheme to University students' tenancy agreements
attributes.additional_details: The university tenancy playing field is uneven. It is right and proper that all young people get support in these dark Covid 19 days.
attributes.background: Private landlords are not supporting the students. There is a postcode lottery of support, some universities have provided direct support. The Governernment needs to create an equitable scheme to prevent young person debt.
